Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
35 Āsavasāsavadukādi, Kusalattika
Āsavasāsavadukādi, Kusalattika
44.
128Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
129Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
130Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
131(Āsavaāsavasampayuttadukaṃ āsavasāsavadukasadisaṃ.)
